item.title: 埃里克-亚当斯的指控如何使纽约市的匹配基金计划成为焦点
item.description: 今年 9 月，纽约市长埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）因联邦腐败指控被起诉，这让纽约市慷慨的竞选配套资金计划成为焦点。【原文：When New York Mayor Eric Adams was indicted on federal corruption charges in September, it thrust the city’s generous campaign matching-funds program into the spotlight.】

item.title: 林德纳称德国不能满足于经济发展道路
item.description: 德国财政部长克里斯蒂安-林德纳（Christian Lindner）表示，德国的经济发展轨迹还有许多不足之处。【原文：Germany’s economic trajectory leaves much to be desired, according to Finance Minister Christian Lindner.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 被最高法院驳回，原因是司法部对特朗普的秘密逮捕令
item.description: 美国最高法院驳回了埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司的上诉，避免了因司法部对唐纳德-特朗普社交媒体账户相关记录的秘密搜查令而引发的冲突。【原文：The US Supreme Court turned away an appeal by Elon Musk’s X Corp., steering clear of a clash over a secret Justice Department search warrant for records related to Donald Trump’s social media account.】

item.title: 西波罗内告诉 ORF：欧洲央行决定评估更快的通货紧缩
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）表示，欧洲中央银行需要在下周的政策会议上评估通货紧缩加速和经济增长疲软的问题。【原文：The European Central Bank will need to evaluate faster disinflation and weaker growth at next week’s policy meeting, according to Executive Board member Piero Cipollone.】

item.title: 富国银行警告云计算实力 "不足"，亚马逊遭减持
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）股价在周一盘前交易中下跌，分析师罕见地下调了该公司的评级，理由是对明年利润趋势的担忧，而云计算业务的增长不太可能弥补这一担忧。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. shares fell in premarket trading on Monday, following a rare analyst downgrade that cited concerns over margin trends into next year, which growth in the cloud computing business is unlikely to compensate for.】

item.title: 顶级橄榄油生产国收成大增，橄榄油危机缓解
item.description: 本季西班牙橄榄油产量将增加近一半，从而缓解了两次歉收后导致价格上涨的供应紧张局面。【原文：Spanish olive oil production is set to jump by almost half this season, easing a supply squeeze that pushed up prices following two poor harvests.】

item.title: 美国企业债券利差反弹至三年低点，与风险背道而驰
item.description: 美国投资级公司债券利差已收窄至三年多来的最低水平，这清楚地表明，即使宏观和地缘政治风险日益加剧，信贷投资者仍是多么看涨。【原文：US investment-grade corporate bond spreads have narrowed to the lowest level in more than three years, a clear sign of just how bullish credit investors are even as macro and geopolitical risks mount.】

item.title: 液化天然气船改道欧洲，迎合中东忧虑引发的涨势
item.description: 由于担心中东爆发更大规模的战争，液化天然气货物正从亚洲转向欧洲，从而导致荷兰基准价格上涨。【原文：Liquefied natural gas cargoes are diverting away from Asia to Europe after fears of a wider war in the Middle East sent benchmark Dutch prices rallying.】

item.title: 穆迪下调评级后塞内加尔欧洲债券损失扩大
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将塞内加尔的信用评级进一步下调至垃圾级，并观察其评级是否会进一步下调。【原文：Senegal’s eurobonds extended losses on Monday after Moody’s Ratings cut its credit rating further into junk status, and placed it on watch for further downgrade.】

item.title: 欧盟主席真蒂洛尼称此前的增长前景与现实相去不远
item.description: 欧元区经济委员保罗-真蒂洛尼（Paolo Gentiloni）表示，尽管存在地缘政治阻力，但欧元区今年的经济增长将接近欧盟委员会预测的 0.8%。【原文：The euro area will achieve growth close to the European Commission’s 0.8% forecast this year despite geopolitical headwinds, according to Economy Commissioner Paolo Gentiloni.】

item.title: 乌克兰称网络攻击导致俄罗斯国家电视台在普京生日当天无法上线
item.description: 据基辅一位知情官员称，乌克兰黑客周一发动网络攻击，关闭了俄罗斯国家电视台和广播频道的在线广播。【原文：Ukrainian hackers carried out a cyberattack that took down online broadcasts of Russian state television and radio channels on Monday, according to an official in Kyiv with knowledge of the operation.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克支持基辅加入欧盟，但希望其保持天然气畅通
item.description: 斯洛伐克支持乌克兰加入欧盟，但希望基辅保持天然气供应畅通，即使俄罗斯的天然气过境协议将于 12 月结束。【原文：Slovakia supports Ukraine’s accession to the European Union, but expects Kyiv to keep gas supplies flowing, even as a transit deal for Russian shipments ends in December.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行重组财富管理部门领导职位
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）在其财富管理和保险部门做出了多项任命，这是西班牙最大的贷款机构该业务新任主管进行的改革的一部分。【原文：Banco Santander SA made several appointments at its wealth management and insurance division as part of changes carried out by the new head of that business at Spain’s largest lender.】

item.title: 美联储减息，公司债券较股票更具优势
item.description: 彭博市场实时脉搏（Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse）的最新调查显示，随着美联储开始降息，企业债务前景正在改善。【原文：The outlook for corporate debt is improving now that the Federal Reserve has begun cutting interest rates, according to the latest Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse survey.】

item.title: 违约激增，私人信贷公司募集巴西困境基金
item.description: 里约热内卢一家专门从事信贷业务的公司 Root Capital 正在启动一项不良债务基金，因为巴西申请破产保护的案件达到了历史新高。【原文：Root Capital, a Rio de Janeiro-based firm specializing in credit, is launching a distressed-debt fund as filings for bankruptcy protection reach record highs in Brazil.】

item.title: 金默里奇说：页岩成本飙升促进了交易的达成
item.description: 基默里奇能源管理公司（Kimmeridge Energy Management Co.【原文：More consolidation in the US shale sector is needed to cope with soaring costs to identify and exploit untapped oil reserves, according to Kimmeridge Energy Management Co.】

item.title: 水供应商美国水厂称黑客入侵系统
item.description: 美国水务公司（American Water Works Co.该公司向 1400 多万人提供饮用水和废水处理服务，它说黑客入侵了它的计算机网络和系统。【原文：American Water Works Co. Inc., which supplies drinking water and wastewater services to more than 14 million people, said hackers had breached its computer networks and systems.】

item.title: 石油市场的剧烈波动不会很快消失
item.description:
布伦特原油期货上周创下近两年来的最大涨幅。【原文：

Brent crude futures posted their biggest gain in almost two years last week.

】

item.title: 巴西降雨预报推低咖啡和大豆价格
item.description: 咖啡和大豆期货下跌，原因是越来越多的人乐观地认为，巴西在未来两周可能会迎来一些急需的降雨。【原文：Coffee and soybean futures dropped on growing optimism that Brazil could see some much needed rains over the next two weeks.】

item.title: 据说沙特阿拉伯将在氢能领域下数十亿美元的赌注
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯正准备在氢能领域下数十亿美元的赌注，并将成立一家新公司来生产这种备受关注的低碳燃料。【原文：Saudi Arabia is preparing to make a multibillion-dollar bet on hydrogen and will launch a new company to produce the much hyped low-carbon fuel, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果调整 iPhone 维修以杜绝欺诈性退货
item.description: 两名诈骗犯因试图从苹果公司的维修专家那里骗取数千部新 iPhone 而被判入狱。但首先...【原文：Two fraudsters were just sentenced to jail for trying to bilk thousands of new iPhones from Apple’s repair specialists. But first...】

item.title: 塞尔维亚债券将在巴尔干地区最新的评级提升中得到推动
item.description: 塞尔维亚政府债券有望延续今年的涨势，这是该政府债券首次升至投资级，也是巴尔干地区在过去一个月里赢得的最新一次信用评级。【原文：Serbian government bonds are poised to extend this year’s gains after its first-ever move into investment grade, in the latest credit rating win for the Balkan region over the past month.】

item.title: 亚马逊 RTO 法令反映出新员工对公司文化不了解的担忧
item.description:
高层领导担心在家工作的政策会使下一代工人落后。【原文：

Senior leadership was concerned the work-from-home policy was leaving the next generation of workers behind.

】

item.title: 50 多家德国小型银行在测试中资本低于最低标准
item.description: 德国最高金融监管机构表示，在作为压力测试一部分的经济冲击情景中，数十家小型银行的资本储备将下降到要求的水平以下。【原文：Germany’s top financial regulator said dozens of smaller banks would see their capital reserves drop below their required levels in a economic shock scenario run as part of a stress test.】

item.title: 伊朗离拥有核武器还有多远？
item.description: 伊朗和以色列之间不断升级的冲突让全世界的目光重新聚焦于伊斯兰共和国的核野心，以及这些野心是否会让它拥有发射原子武器的能力。【原文：The escalating conflict between Iran and Israel has refocused the world’s attention on the Islamic Republic’s nuclear ambitions, and whether they’re giving it the capability to fire an atomic weapon.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美国 10 年期国债收益率重回 4% 以上，交易员们在经济乐观情绪与中东紧张局势之间进行权衡，华尔街的专家们也转而更加看好股市。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The US 10-year yield is back above 4%, traders weigh economic optimism against tensions in the Middle East and Wall Street experts are turning more bullish on stocks. Here’s what’s moving markets.— David Goodman】

item.title: 中国经纪商不放假，为 "繁忙 "的开业做好准备
item.description: 中国的券商和证券交易所正在为周二的疯狂做准备，届时在岸市场将在长达一周的假期后重新开市，市场乐观情绪高涨，认为中国政府的刺激措施将使股市再次上扬。【原文：Brokerages and stock exchanges in China are gearing up for a frantic Tuesday when onshore markets reopen after a week-long holiday, with optimism running high that Beijing’s stimulus measures will give shares another leg up.】

item.title: Equinor 购入丹麦风电巨头 Orsted 25 亿美元股份
item.description: Equinor ASA 公司斥资 25 亿美元收购了丹麦风能巨头 Orsted A/S 公司的股份，将北欧地区最大的化石燃料公司之一与该地区最大的可再生能源开发商结合在一起。【原文：Equinor ASA acquired a $2.5 billion stake in Danish wind energy giant Orsted A/S, pairing one of the Nordic region’s biggest fossil fuel companies with its largest renewable power developer.】

item.title: 百达翡丽香港持有中国建设银行股份增至 8.3
item.description: 据香港交易所披露，10 月 3 日，Pictet Asset Management Hong Kong Ltd. 持有的中国建设银行股份从 0.01% 增至 8.32%。【原文：Pictet Asset Management Hong Kong Ltd.’s holding in China Construction Bank shares was raised to 8.32% on Oct. 3 from 0.01%, according to a Hong Kong Exchange disclosure.】

item.title: 亚利桑那州因 2020 年大选混乱而伤痕累累，加强投票安全
item.description: 新的锻铁围栏环绕着马里科帕县办公室，下个月将在这里计票。选举日当天，还将设置混凝土障碍物，并配备便衣警察和骑警。【原文：A new wrought-iron fence wraps around the Maricopa County office where votes will be counted next month. On Election Day, there’ll be concrete barriers too, along with plainclothes officers and mounted police.】
